en..instructions:
The simplest way to delete a specific value in a sorted array is to do a linear search. The program starts at the beginning and looks at each value in the array one by one until it finds the value to delete.

In this exercise, you will simulate a linear search for five values in a sorted array.

  1. Click the 'Next' button until you've reached the correct value.

  2. Click 'Delete' to delete the value.

  3. Repeat until you have deleted all five specified values.
